channel.title: [New]VertexPk is BACK! | Active Pking | Skilling | Great Economy
channel.description:
Site: [url=http://www.vertexpk.com]VertexPK[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.vertexpk.com/play]VertexPK - Webclient[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.vertexpk.com/forum]Forums[/url]
[SPOILER=Features]VertexPK Features:
Uptime: 24/7 Engine load: 1% per 20 players (can hold over 100 players without lag) Great VPS, no lag. Webclient Forums Highscores Warrior's Guilds (to obtain defenders) 100% like RuneScape. All skills redone and working 100% Slayer tasks working great Slayer tower with all NPC's and correctly Drops Firemaking Clipped Vote System with Rewards Brawling Gloves Stake Dice Game with Percentile and 2-6 sided to Dice Duel Loyalty titles Player Following Clipped Player Walking Clipped Npc Following Clipped Npc Walking Clipped 508 Gameframe 614 Hitmarkers 525 Maps & Objects 614 Characters 622 Items 602 Animations & GFX Curses Clan chat All fight modes clipped and right. Items switching's fast Every items with correctly animations & special attacks Prayers and curses all working correctly Kill/Death Ratio Pk Points System with Pk Points Shop Wilderness teleport to: Mage Bank, Wests Dragons (10 Wild), East Dragons (18 Wild), Multi-Easts (44 Wild), Dark Castle Multi (17 Wild) When you have 100+ kills your skull be red, like fight pits. Command to change spell book ::spells Command to change prayer book ::curses All drops of NPC's 100% correctly Slayer tower's with right drops and npc spawns. Corporeal beast Dagannoth kings Godwars all minigames working 100% Summoning is working 100%, withdrawing/depositing of BOB is working. Familiar interaction is 100%. Duel arena is 100% with no dupes. All curses and prayers are 100% PvM, including NEX and GWD are 100% and have no glitches. Unique textures and animations. All animations are patched. Combat/PvP is completly fixed. Combat styles are unique. Working Ganodermic, chaotics, etc.
Fight Caves (Jad) More will be added soon. All has been re-done, working 100% ::skills command for a area with most of skills. Skills are clipped, with good rate, and we've highscores.[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/1351/ztx2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x6WcMDb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9BxH2Bh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9FNDX5B.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AGYkyyl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pkp5MxD.png[/img] [IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/3731/t2yw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g7w1TM9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dOo1ZwE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QSssYch.png[/img] [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1205/vpmp.png[/img] [IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/7973/ixuj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/1493/e6ro.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T0DSMIp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OqIBglD.png[/img] [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/2120/rmvl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6id7USj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/340/qd1c.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
This is just a small preview of our server, It holds many more features that were not written down here!
Join today; [url=http://vertexpk.com]VertexPK[/url]
Credits; 80% Krithium, for the source. 19% Pkiller for coding this in and fixing most dupes and glitches. 1% Me for uploading this; (Im Tom) Edit: Domain bought.

[SPOILER=Features]VertexPK Features:

Engine load: 1% per 20 players (can hold over 100 players without lag)
